title: A Survey on Evaluation of Large Language Models in Natural Language Processing

sections.description: Introduce the topic of large language models (LLMs) and their significance in natural language processing (NLP). Discuss the growing interest in evaluating LLMs and the need for a comprehensive survey on this topic. Provide an overview of the paper's objectives and structure.

subsections.subsection title: Significance of Large Language Models in NLP
subsections.description: Explain the importance and impact of LLMs on NLP and its various applications.
Discuss the increasing focus on assessing the capabilities and limitations of LLMs in research and industry.

subsections.subsection title: Objectives and Structure of the Survey
subsections.description: Outline the goals of the survey and provide a roadmap of the paper's structure.

sections.description: Provide a foundational understanding of large language models, natural language processing, AI model assessment, and language model benchmarking. Define key terms and concepts to ensure clarity for readers.

subsections.subsection title: Foundational Concepts and Evolution of Large Language Models
subsections.description: Discuss the basic concepts and historical development of LLMs.

subsections.subsection title: AI Model Assessment and Benchmarking Challenges
subsections.description: Explain the challenges involved in evaluating AI models, specifically focusing on LLMs.

sections.section title: Methodologies for Evaluating Large Language Models
sections.description: Explore various methodologies used to evaluate LLMs, including qualitative and quantitative approaches.

subsections.subsection title: Dynamic Evaluation Approaches and Benchmarking Frameworks
subsections.description: Analyze innovative approaches to dynamically assessing LLMs and the frameworks used for benchmarking.

subsections.subsection title: Frameworks for Bias and Ethical Evaluation
subsections.description: Discuss the methodologies for evaluating ethical and bias-related aspects of LLMs.
Examine the evolving methods of user-involved evaluation techniques for LLM assessment.

sections.description: Examine the metrics used to assess the performance and effectiveness of LLMs.

sections.description: Identify and discuss the challenges involved in benchmarking and evaluating LLMs.

subsections.description: Address the issues related to data bias, ethical concerns, scalability, and resource constraints.

subsections.subsection title: Dynamic Nature of Language and Knowledge
subsections.description: Highlight how the evolving nature of language affects the assessment of LLMs.

Explore specific NLP tasks where LLMs have been evaluated for their performance.
